医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了夜班工人理想的午睡策略对 2012 年至 2018 年进行的夜班小睡试点研究的新分析揭示了理想的小睡策略，可能有助于抵消 16 小时通宵工作期间的困倦和疲劳。这些发现也能让新父母受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-reveals-ideal-napping-strategy-for-night-shift-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-reveals-ideal-napping-strategy-for-night-shift-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a9c0e1f-57c4-49b2-ad94-6d825add2d4d Fri, 15 Sep 2023 19:20:00 -0400 Study reveals ideal napping strategy for night shift workers
疫情期间药剂师的工作量增加，工作环境更加恶劣顾客即使生病了也会出现，不同意这些限制，并且给员工带来了许多新任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Pharmacists-experienced-increased-workloads-and-tougher-work-environments-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Pharmacists-experienced-increased-workloads-and-tougher-work-environments-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56db3a7e-1462-4300-a17a-071cbe82470f Fri, 15 Sep 2023 19:14:00 -0400 Pharmacists experienced increased workloads and tougher work environments during the pandemic
斯图尔特·奥金 (Stuart Orkin) 因开发镰状细胞病疗法而荣获第三届伊莱恩·雷丁·布林斯特奖 (Elaine Redding Brinster)宾夕法尼亚大学再生医学研究所授予 Stuart Orkin 医学博士第三届伊莱恩·雷丁·布林斯特科学奖，以表彰他发现血红蛋白基因转换的基础并应用这些见解来开发镰状细胞病和其他血液疾病疗法的工作或医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Stuart-Orkin-receives-the-third-Elaine-Redding-Brinster-Prize-for-development-of-sickle-cell-disease-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Stuart-Orkin-receives-the-third-Elaine-Redding-Brinster-Prize-for-development-of-sickle-cell-disease-therapy.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7f480b9-d464-431d-aab4-8a47bca4be46 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 19:09:00 -0400 Stuart Orkin receives the third Elaine Redding Brinster Prize for development of sickle cell disease therapy
麻醉科医师-科学家队伍落后于其他专业，尤其是女性麻醉学研究人员负责医学上一些最重大的进步，从测试新生儿健康状况的阿普加评分到心肺复苏 (CPR)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Anesthesiology-physician-scientist-pipeline-trails-other-specialties-pspecially-among-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Anesthesiology-physician-scientist-pipeline-trails-other-specialties-pspecially-among-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9de9ca5-e4a4-4585-a781-9c8598d81461 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 19:04:00 -0400 Anesthesiology physician-scientist pipeline trails other specialties, particularly among women
英国马基癌症中心成为 NCI 指定综合癌症中心肯塔基大学马基癌症中心今天宣布，它已获得美国国家癌症研究所“综合”癌症中心称号，这是美国国家癌症研究所授予的最高级别的认可。马基是肯塔基州第一个也是唯一一个获得此称号的中心，第二个最近的综合癌症中心距离列克星敦近 200 英里。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/UK-Markey-Cancer-Center-becomes-NCI-Designated-Compressive-Cancer-Center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/UK-Markey-Cancer-Center-becomes-NCI-Designated-Compressive-Cancer-Center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b80b999-08c7-44f1-81f4-e195037004d6 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 16:44:00 -0400 UK Markey Cancer Center becomes NCI-Designated Comprehensive Cancer Center
利用海蛞蝓的大脑绘制人类大脑发育图马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校的一位神经科学家获得了美国国家神经疾病和中风研究所的 310 万美元拨款，用于通过使用一个不寻常的课题：海蛞蝓的大脑来增进对人类大脑发育的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Using-sea-slug-brains-to-map- human-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Using-sea-slug-brains-to-map- human-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b419e4d-a13a-48a5-a18b-cb52e3305aef Fri, 15 Sep 2023 16:17:00 -0400 Using sea slug brains to map human brain development
NIH 启动新研究通用流感疫苗的一期试验位于马里兰州贝塞斯达的美国国立卫生研究院临床中心已开始招募一种新的研究性通用流感候选疫苗的第一阶段试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/NIH-launches-Phase-1-trial-of-new-investigational-universal-influenza-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/NIH-launches-Phase-1-trial-of-new-investigational-universal-influenza-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c06d7477-ec51-4c53-87c3-6f4bf73b0e1a Fri, 15 Sep 2023 16:10:00 -0400 NIH launches Phase 1 trial of new investigational universal influenza vaccine
研究发现没有证据表明 YouTube 在大流行期间宣扬了反疫苗情绪由伊利诺伊大学香槟分校数据科学专家和联合国全球脉动领导的新研究发现，没有强有力的证据表明 YouTube 在 COVID-19 大流行期间宣扬了反疫苗情绪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-finds-no-evidence-that-YouTube-promoted-anti-vaccine-sentiment-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-finds-no-evidence-that-YouTube-promoted-anti-vaccine-sentiment-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbc4743b-a1ec-413d-877c-8972861151a1 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 16:04:00 -0400 Study finds no evidence that YouTube promoted anti-vaccine sentiment during the pandemic
VTCSOM 授予赠款以加强卫生系统科学教育卫生系统科学是一个新兴领域，重点研究如何提供护理、卫生专业人员如何协作以及卫生系统如何改善患者护理和卫生保健服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/VTCSOM-awarded-grants-to-enhance-health-systems-science-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/VTCSOM-awarded-grants-to-enhance-health-systems-science-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abaf5c46-4eb2-4eca-a282-3681cec39fb3 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 15:41:00 -0400
与大脑皮层微观结构差异相关的邻里劣势俗话说，你吃什么就是什么。但受影响的不仅仅是身体。根据加州大学洛杉矶分校大卫格芬医学院的研究，生活在贫困社区会影响食物选择、体重增加，甚至大脑的微观结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Neighborhood-disadvantage-linked-with-differences-in-Microstruction-of-the-brains-cortex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Neighborhood-disadvantage-linked-with-differences-in-Microstruct-of-the-brains-cortex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eabda1b-7d8d-4ed7-b6ae-23f87b10647e Fri, 15 Sep 2023 15:23:00 -0400 Neighborhood disadvantage associated with differences in microstructure of the brain's cortex
